unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Film festivals are popping up everywhere, it seems. From the Himalayas to Kanyakumari, India's got film fest fever!
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Film festivals are popping up everywhere, it seems. From the Himalayas to Kanyakumari, India's got film fest fever!

unnormalised: Just wrapped up the Chennai International Film Festival, showcasing some killer indie films. And whispers are swirling about the upcoming Goa Film Festival – think sun, sand, and seriously good cinema. Apparently, a retrospective on Satyajit Ray is planned!
normalised: Just wrapped up the Chennai International Film Festival, showcasing some killer indie films. And whispers are swirling about the upcoming Goa Film Festival – think sun, sand, and seriously good cinema. Apparently, a retrospective on Satyajit Ray is planned!

unnormalised: But that's not all! Smaller, regional festivals are also making waves. The Pondicherry International Film Festival promises some cutting-edge narratives, and we're hearing the Kerala International Film Festival (happening around Onam!) will have a special focus on South Asian cinema. Fuel up on some biryani before diving into those screenings, folks!
normalised: But that's not all! Smaller, regional festivals are also making waves. The Pondicherry International Film Festival promises some cutting-edge narratives, and we're hearing the Kerala International Film Festival (happening around Onam!) will have a special focus on South Asian cinema. Fuel up on some biryani before diving into those screenings, folks!

unnormalised: These festivals are a great platform for emerging filmmakers, offering a chance to connect with producers and distributors. Plus, you might just discover the next big thing in Indian cinema. Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: These festivals are a great platform for emerging filmmakers, offering a chance to connect with producers and distributors. Plus, you might just discover the next big thing in Indian cinema. Stay tuned for more updates!
